item.description:
With thousands of freedom-loving motorcyclists heading to New Hampshire's 84th Annual Bike Week, it's time to get out with some Ron Paul signs and let those good bikers know which candidate wants to Live Free or Die.

We'll bring signs and banners; bring your own if you've got them, or just show up and help. I'll also pack some t-shirts, bumper stickers, and whatever else I can find.

Note: Given that it's Bike Week, I suspect parking will be, um, difficult. So be prepared for a little circling--but the crowd should be worth it!
item.name: Sign Wave at Bike Week - Weirs Beach
